message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,400,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I agree the product is valuable, that price is a little high for me. Would you consider $1,050,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you think the product is a bit pricey, but I believe its value will only continue to grow. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $1,250,000, and that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  To be honest, $1,200,000 is the highest I can go. If you're unable to do that, I'll have to explore other options.

Bob, I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can do $1,300,000, and that's as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
